downloadDescription: Lync Accelerate program resources with the overall goals of deployment and adoption.
detailsSection: The Lync Accelerate – Deploy and Adopt download includes program resources from the Lync Accelerate program. Specifically, it includes resources guidance for deployment and adoption of Lync.  We have designed the Right Start program to leverage the best practice tools and approaches that have guided successful Lync Voice deployments and adoption.
systemRequirementsSection: • The files are Microsoft Word and PowerPoint documents.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
